entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
